entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTHEAST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
WINDY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS, BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 60
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
